blog.name: mcrvel
blog.title: Oh Hozier, We’re Really In It Now
blog.description: Love art, movies, endgame, hozier and queer eye.

tags: i... how... does the timeline EVEN WORK NOW?!
summary:
Hold on wait you guys. If endgame is 5 years in the future then... 
Spider-Man should be set in 2024... not 2019 right? 
Like...
body:
Hold on wait you guys. If endgame is 5 years in the future then…

Spider-Man should be set in 2024… not 2019 right?

Like all the movies from now on are gonna be 5 years in the future

Or are we just gonna suddenly go back to 2019?

In which case….. everyone is still snapped or pre-snap….

I feel…….like the Russo’s didn’t think about this

summary: Folks saying that cap used mjolnir better in 15 minutes than thor did in 1500 years is...bad caps a lot A LOT more agile than...
body: Folks saying that cap used mjolnir better in 15 minutes than thor did in 1500 years is…bad caps a lot A LOT more agile than thor ever was so coupling the strength that being worthy+ caps natural(enhanced by serum) speed it only makes sense that cap dishes out those gorgeous combos he did in endgame ya know

blog.name: infrared-eyeliner
blog.description: Fanfiction. Marvel. Sebastian Stan. Brooklyn Baby. 25. Requests are open. <a href="http://marvel-trash07.tumblr.com/post/181909893513/masterlist">Masterlist<a/>

body:
PSA

After posting a few (what I thought were) valid points on an avengers post 2/3ish weeks ago, I woke up today with 3 death threats in my inbox

Now, I don’t care enough to go find these people or person and report them because I know they’re just being petty that I didn’t agree with them

BUT

If I had received these about a month ago? Who knows? I have severe depression and suicidal ideation and that kinda shit is not good

And it’s not healthy in a fandom. I’m not gonna apologize for disagreeing with you and you aren’t gonna change my views on Endgame just because you told me I should die for having ‘stupid unintelligent opinions’. I’m so fed up with this fandom honestly (probs the reason I haven’t been inspired to write).

What I will apologize for is this: I’m sorry that some of your guys’ heads are so far up your asses that you treat the ending of Endgame like it’s reality and these people are real. I understand Marvel has begun to churn out products rather than art, but IT IS FICTION.

And yes, while media and reality have become a circular pattern, and it’s definitely up for being analyzed and whatnot, it’s not enough to render death threats due to discourse. Cut the shit and get over yourself

blog.name: infinitemovielist
blog.title: A Cinematographic Feast
blog.description: It’s just a fantastic thing, to get lost inside the world of film.

tags: It took me a rewatch and a few weeks to understand what I experienced with this movie
It really felt like the closing of a chapter in popular culture
It's not a masterpiece but overall it did right by most of these characters
Although the Russo's are kind of full of shit
For all their explaining what they didn't actually include in the film a la J. K. Rowling
Yet it was pretty decent and resonated deep

blog.name: hobbitpottaaaa
blog.title: Elmonzo Stark ⎊
blog.description: | Robert Downey Jr., a bunch of other stuff and cats, lots of cats, I love cats, catscatscats... | Arrested Development is life. So is 30 Rock. Bob Downey is pure love. And my favourite (Bob) cat. I figured I should say Spanish is my first language.

tags: I wrote fifteen and added an extra one
I'm not sure if all of that can happen in fifteen minutes but a lot of things happen in a movie minute though
I didn't do it; my fingers did
summary: Petition for Marvel to spend a few more bucks and call Gwyneth, RDJ and Lexi Rabe to make a fifteen-minute one-shot of Tony,...
body:
Petition for Marvel to spend a few more bucks and call Gwyneth, RDJ and Lexi Rabe to make a fifteen-minute one-shot of Tony, Pepper, and Morgan for the Endgame extra material.

I want to see how many times out of a number Tony told Morgan a bedtime story that wasn’t “Once upon a time Maguna went to bed. End of the story” 😂

Or how Pepper sends Morgan to get Tony out of the garage and an hour later Pepper has to drag them both out of there.

Also, how many times Morgan wakes up in the middle of the night and tries to wake Tony but he “ignores” her so Morgan goes to Pepper’s side and tells her to wake dad up, and Pepper just blasts an arm against Tony, making him giggle and wake up. What he does is basically embrace Morgan until both of them are warm and sleepy enough, and then put Morgan back to bed.

I want to see how Tony looks all over the house for his girls to finally find them at the little house looking at the little worm Morgan found.

I want to see how Pepper tells Tony that Morgan should eat at her place on the table when Tony holds Morgan and helps her eat, but Pepper just can’t be angry at two pair of puppy eyes saying dad makes it fun and she ends up joining them.

Or all the times Morgan fell asleep watching a movie but not before eating ice cream thanks to Tony and how Pepper just sits next to them and eats ice cream as well.

Or that time Pepper found Tony and Morgan crying because they watched The Lion King so she sat there and embraced both of them in a big bear hug.

Or how both of them go to bed at 3am because they almost couldn’t get Morgan to sleep.

I need to see Pepper finding Morgan playing with Tony’s hair because he fell asleep on the couch.

I’d love to see every time Pepper says “No shit, Tony” and he’s just heart-eyes and smirk.

I want to see Pepper telling Morgan a different story for each plant and flower they have, so Morgan tells them ALL to Tony afterward.

Or how declared house husband Tony Stark makes sure to keep hydrated Pepper and Morgan when they’re outside working on their growing vegetables.

I want to see the three of them baking cookies. And the messy one is, of course, Tony because he makes sure to keep the ladies impeccable. 

Or how the three of them design weird stuff on Tony’s designing table.

I want to see Tony and Pepper arguing over a recipe while Morgan eats popcorn and watches them.

Or that time the three of them were at the lake when suddenly Happy gets there with burgers surprising Tony and Morgan because Pepper was the one to order them.

blog.description: HI! this is my blog, it's dedicated to my intrests such as Politics (American, left-wing, Democrat, huge Hillary Clinton fan) Judaism (culture, religion, anti-semtism, and left wing Zionism), Comics (DC, most of all Bats) Gay stuff (LGBT rghts, culture, pretty boys) TV shows  (Please Like Me, The Crown, Stranger Things) Books (Rick Riordan, YA in general, gay YA, Half Bad, Raven Boys, Carry On) I'm sure I've forgotten stuff but that's the idea, my ask box is ALWAYS open, I love love getting messages, so don't be shy!

summary: Avengers: Endgame is Less Than $100 Million Away from Passing Avatar
title: Avengers: Endgame is Less Than $100 Million Away from Passing Avatar
body:
Avengers: Endgame is Less Than $100 Million Away from Passing Avatar

Heading into its 6th end of the week in theaters, Avengers: Endgame is presently under $100 million far from toppling Avatar as the most elevated netting film to ever hit theaters. Through Tuesday night, Endgame has banked $2.688 billion universally, just shy of $100m from Avatar’s $2.787b worldwide take. Following a record-setting opening end of the week which saw the Russo Brothers-coordinated…

View On WordPress

blog.name: damngcoffee

blog.description: 30-something spinster fangirl. I blog about: MCU & occasionally other fandoms, ace/aro stuff, spooky things.

summary: Mini-rant: I really want to stop seeing posts defending Endgame that act like liking the ending means you have ascended to some...
body: Mini-rant: I really want to stop seeing posts defending Endgame that act like liking the ending means you have ascended to some kind of higher plane of understanding. My anger about the ending does not equate to a toddler throwing a tantrum. I am not less rational for evaluating the good and bad points of the movie and finding that the latter outweigh the former. And I do not have to concede any points about its ‘objective’ good quality (especially re: Steve), because I fundamentally disagree for a (very large) number of reasons.

And I do not have to concede any points about its ‘objective’ good quality (especially re: Steve), because I fundamentally disagree for a (very large) number of reasons.

And I do not have to concede any points about its ‘objective’ good quality (especially re: Steve), because I fundamentally disagree for a (very large) number of reasons.

And I do not have to concede any points about its ‘objective’ good quality (especially re: Steve), because I fundamentally disagree for a (very large) number of reasons.
